e9ba5c65-b4fe-43a5-b92a-479412bbb7c3.description: The JNCIA x 5 certification badge from Juniper Networks recognizes individuals who have developed a broad range of introductory skills across a number of networking technologies. 13449a83-271d-44fd-9a2a-12944a132f46.description: Technical Champions have been the foundation of this community for nearly a decade. As the cornerstone of the Champions community, we chose the lion to represent these powerful, energetic, and respected leaders. Technical Champions develop expertise in Juniper products, technologies, and domains to effectively position Juniper solutions in routing, switching, and security. Innovative Technical Champions reflect Juniper value to Be Bold in charting a course to becoming a Legendary champion.
13449a83-271d-44fd-9a2a-12944a132f46.name: Innovative Technical Champion

cd3f3867-11fc-4102-96ec-f20a9550d75e.description: The JNCIE x 3 certification badge from Juniper Networks recognizes individuals who have become experts in a number of networking technologies. Individuals have achieved any three of the expert-level certifications for Service Provider (JNCIE-SP), Enterprise (JNCIE-ENT), Data Center (JNCIE-DC), or Security (JNCIE-SEC). A recipient of this badge is well-positioned to manage and lead the highest-performing networks in the world.
cd3f3867-11fc-4102-96ec-f20a9550d75e.name: JNCIE x 3

badge_template_activities.title: Must hold three active JNCIE certifications.

e4fde0ec-b89c-4762-8f08-7a9e60f849b7.description: Technical Champions have been the foundation of this program for nearly a decade. As the cornerstone of the Champions community, we chose the lion to represent these powerful, energetic, and respected leaders. Technical Champions develop expertise in Juniper products, technologies, and domains in order to effectively position Juniper solutions in routing, switching, and security. The Ingenious Technical Champion is the intermediate rank for the Technical Champion Journey.
e4fde0ec-b89c-4762-8f08-7a9e60f849b7.name: Ingenious Technical Champion

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve 5,000 Champion Loyalty Points per year.

5342dac5-d001-472c-a741-dcbd4caea1ab.description: Highly knowledgeable, social, and ambitious, wolves represent our Sales Champions. These versatile creatures can be successful on their own, but also sell skillfully in a pack. Sales Champions are well-positioned to win business faster by accelerating sales processes through prioritization of lead distribution, access to pre-sales tools, and invitations to virtual community events. Innovative Sales Champions reflect Juniper value to Be Bold in charting a course to becoming a Legendary champion.
5342dac5-d001-472c-a741-dcbd4caea1ab.name: Innovative Sales Champion

717c070b-5613-4730-9907-fa3a4dfaa07d.description: The JNCIE-ENT Emeritus signifies that the individual maintained an active JNCIE-ENT certification for a period of 9 years or longer. The JNCIE-ENT credential validates Junos OS expertise and the ability to deploy, configure, manage and troubleshoot Junos-based enterprise routing and switching platforms. A certification holder at this level is capable of building an enterprise network infrastructure consisting of multiple routers and switching devices.

The Legendary Sales Champion is the highest rank for the Sales Champion Journey.
a6ea1802-76ff-4547-89e8-3e77459aeb65.name: Legendary Sales Champion

845e5dd5-7fb8-493e-8412-b2707bfa3508.description: The JNCIE x 4 certification badge from Juniper Networks recognizes individuals who have developed an extensive range of expert-level skills across numerous networking technologies. Individuals have achieved expert-level certifications for Service Provider, Enterprise, Data Center, and Security. A recipient of this badge is well-positioned to manage and lead the highest-performing networks in the world and represents the pinnacle of networking skills in the industry.

7e32e998-c46e-4749-9b4e-073e49d1ba7c.description: The JNCIE-SEC Emeritus signifies that the individual maintained an active JNCIE-SEC certification for a period of 9 years or longer. The JNCIE-SEC credential validates expertise with Junos software for SRX Series devices and the ability to deploy, configure, manage, and troubleshoot Junos OS security platforms. A certification holder at this level is capable of building a secure enterprise network consisting of multiple firewall devices interconnected with IPsec VPNs.

46277341-2bfe-4ba6-ba39-3fa57bd2563a.description: The JNCIE-Cloud validates the ability to deploy, configure, manage, and troubleshoot Juniper Networks' cloud networking technologies. A certification holder at this level is capable of building a cloud network consisting of multiple interconnected sites and services using cloud technologies.
46277341-2bfe-4ba6-ba39-3fa57bd2563a.name: Juniper Networks Certified Expert, Cloud (JNCIE-Cloud)

81c043d2-51ce-4d76-85b2-aa8411c68d48.description: Distribution Champions will gain access to community specific content to help distinguish themselves as expert Juniper ambassadors. The Ingenious Distribution Champion is the intermediate rank for the Distribution Champion Journey.

68ebd544-3497-47f1-afaf-d610701ce868.description: Highly knowledgeable, social, and ambitious, wolves represent our Sales Champions. These versatile creatures can be successful on their own, but also sell skillfully in a pack. Sales Champions are well-positioned to win business faster by accelerating sales processes through prioritization of lead distribution, access to pre-sales tools, and invitations to virtual community events. The intermediate rank for Sales Champion Journey.
68ebd544-3497-47f1-afaf-d610701ce868.name: Ingenious Sales Champion

0ea72de3-406e-4424-bdc3-ffa716a37708.description: The JNCIE x 5 certification badge from Juniper Networks recognizes individuals who have developed an extensive range of expert-level skills across numerous networking technologies. Individuals have achieved expert-level certifications for Cloud, Service Provider, Enterprise, Data Center, and Security. A recipient of this badge is well-positioned to manage and lead the highest-performing networks in the world and represents the pinnacle of networking skills in the industry.
